text: Before Unless there is another indication, _ experiment full speed (> 10,000 x g or 10,000~ 14,000 rpm) in a microcentrifuge at room temperature. Add all of RiNase A solution into buffer SI before first use and store it at 4°C. Buffer S2 and G3 may precipitate at cool ambient conditions. If precipitate appears, dissolve it in 37 °C water bath until completely dissolved. Prepare new 1.5 ml or 2.0 ml microcentrifuge tubes.
